Kosmatology Face Moisturizer, Rose Geranium (2018 formulation)

Brand: Kosmatology

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Organic Vitis Vinifera (Grape Seed) Oil, Organic Cannibis Sativa (Hemp Seed) oil, Olea europaea (Olive) oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, , Anthemis nobilis (Chamomile) oil, Sambucus nigra Fruit Extract, Organic Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) essential oil, Organic Daucus Carota (Carrot seed) essential oil, Organic

Seed Oil, , Anthemis nobilis (Chamomile) oil, Sambucus nigra Fruit Extract, Organic Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) essential oil, Organic Daucus Carota (Carrot seed) essential oil, Organic Pelargonium graveolens (Rose Geranium) essential oil, Calendula officinalis (Calendula) oil
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
